title: Pork loin cooked in milk
description: Matt's take on the classic Italian recipe of veal slow-cooked in milk uses pork to make it easier, but just as delicious.
ingredients: 3–4 kg/6lb 8oz–8lb 13oz whole pork loin on the bone
2 small or 1 large garlic bulb, cut horizontally through the middle
2 lemons, thick strips of zest and juice only
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 bunch Swiss chard, stems removed and roughly chopped, leaves shredded
